translation.text: https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
ME The 51st/53rd Street/Hyde Park East elevator is out of service.
The 51st/53rd Street/Hyde Park East elevator is out of service. Customers can use McCormick Place or 55th/56th/57th Street as alternate boarding stations.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF Train 1254 is Moving - Delayed

BNSF train #1254 scheduled to arrive Chicago Union Station at 11:20 AM, may be operating 30 to 40 minutes behind schedule, due to earlier mechanical problems. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/NCS?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
NCS Trains 114 is Moving

NCS train #114 scheduled to arrive Chicago Union Station at 10:49 AM, may be operating 30 to 45 minutes behind schedule, due to earlier track construction. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
ME The 103rd Street/Rosemoor elevator is out of service.
The 103rd Street/Rosemoor elevator is out of service.  Customers can use 87th Street/Woodruff or 115th Street/Kensington as alternate boarding stations.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MED 79th, 87th, 103rd St. Station ADA Accessibility
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 79th St., 87th St., and 103rd St. stations may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Michigan and Randolph Elevator Out of Service

The Michigan Avenue elevator located on the southwest corner of Michigan and Randolph is permanently out of service. Customers can use the South Water elevator, 225 N Michigan Avenue, or McCormick Place as an alternate boarding station.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
RI-The Joliet East End Elevator is Out of Service
The Rock Island Eastern Avenue elevator will be out of service for several days. Customers can use the Station elevator to access the boarding platform.
